name: Exitous
description: We make it easy for HR teams to leverage the data they already have in their company systems to empower exiting workers with AI-powered, human-vetted, personalized job exit roadmaps in a caring, wellbeing-focused platform.
one_liner: We make it easy for HR teams to leverage the data they already have in their company systems to empower exiting workers with AI-powered, human-vetted, personalized job exit roadmaps in a caring, wellbeing-focused platform.
